name: AVAudioCommonFormat
desc: The format options that describe common audio formats.

items.name: case otherFormat
items.desc: A format other than one the enumeration specifies.

items.name: case pcmFormatFloat32
items.desc: A format that represents the standard format as native-endian floats.

items.name: case pcmFormatFloat64
items.desc: A format that represents native-endian doubles.

items.name: case pcmFormatInt16
items.desc: A format that represents signed 16-bit native-endian integers.

items.name: case pcmFormatInt32
items.desc: A format that represents signed 32-bit native-endian integers.
